original_text: The people who sold these things will say to the city, ‘You have now lost all the good things that you wanted so much. You have lost all those expensive things that made you beautiful. You will never have them again.’ The people who sold these things will say to the city, ‘You have now lost all the good things that you wanted so much. You have lost all those expensive things that made you beautiful. You will never have them again.’ The people who sold these things will say to the city, ‘You have now lost all the good things that you wanted so much. You have lost all those expensive things that made you beautiful. You will never have them again.’
korean_text: 바벨론아 네 영혼이 탐하던 과일이 네게서 떠났으며 맛있는 것들과 빛난 것들이 다 없어졌으니 사람들이 결코 이것들을 다시 보지 못하리로다

sentences.original_text: The people who sold these things
will say to the city
You have now lost all the good things
that you wanted so much
You have lost all those expensive things
that made you beautiful
You will never have them again
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 결코 그것들을 다시 가지지 못할 것이다
